0: AN ACT CREATING AN ADDITIONAL REGIONAL TRIAL COURT BRANCH IN THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL SUR TO BE STATIONED IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF SAN MIGUEL, FURTHER AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 14 PARAGRAPH (j) OF BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980", AS AMENDED, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
